title: Leave buster after leaving a custom bot game...
body: Seriously Riot...? Seriously?  There was no player in there other than me, I just wanted to try out Rek'Sai before jumping into a normal game.

replies.body: +10000000 for not going straight into normals
lol, leaver buster is just silly.
Leaver Buster does not punish for custom games. You more than likely already had a punishment, which it just started applying.

left a custom game to try out kalista and I was by myself. and i get a 20 minute low priority queue.
rito op
